# zendesk_trigger_category (Resource)

Provides a trigger category resource.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# API reference:
#   https://developer.zendesk.com/rest_api/docs/core/ticket_fields

resource "zendesk_trigger_category" "example" {
  name     = "My Category"
  position = 1
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the category.

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `position` (Number) The relative position of the trigger category. Must be at least 0.
